item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @kyled123 kyled123
item.description:
@kyled123 wrote:

How can i make this command spawn more then 1 of an item at a time? At the moment if i want to spawn 2 ags, i have to do ::item 11694, then bank the first one, then do it again. Even noted items, i can only spawn one, then i have to bank it before i can spawn another.

if (inputString.startsWith("::item")) { int newItemID = 0; try { String[] args = inputString.split(" "); if (args.length == 2) { newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); stream.createFrame(237); //magic on items stream.writeWord(0); // slot stream.method432(newItemID); // itemid stream.writeWord(0); // junk stream.method432(1155);// spellid } } catch(Exception e) {} }

Read full topic
